article_title: Do Smart Devices Need Regulation? FTC Examines Internet Of Things

article_metadata.description: At an FTC forum, companies tout the convenience and efficiency of smart devices in the home while privacy and security experts warn of dangers.
article_metadata.author: Amadou Diallo
